name: Music RPG
description:
If something weird happens, try hitting “reload" on your web browser and try again.

Keyboard: Arrow keys move, Enter or Z chooses options, hold shift to run

Mouse or tablet: Click/tap on stuff

Have fun!

Fill this out when you beat the game
Hey kids, don't fill out the form more than once!!!

I created this game in the span of about fourteen hours using RPG Maker MV. The program is expensive but if you look on Steam during sale times, you can get it cheaper.
